subject: TestListener not listening to TestSuites
msgSnippet: TestListener is called back for TestCases only.  Is there any reason why the framework does not call startTest() and endTest() methods for ALL instances of
messageBody:
TestListener is called back for TestCases only. Is there any reason why the framework does not call startTest() and endTest() methods for ALL instances of junit.framework.Test. I'm currently trying to write custom ResultPrinters and it would be very useful to know when a test suite start and when it end.
